  <a href="news_archive.qmd">View Archive</a>

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from IPython.display import display, HTML

# Load Excel
df = pd.read_excel("spreadsheets/news_archive.xlsx")

# Parse using known format: 27-Jun-25
df['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date'], format='%d-%b-%y', errors='coerce')
df = df[df['Date'].notna()]
df = df.sort_values(by='Date', ascending=False)

# Exclude entries where Title starts with "Job Opportunity"
df = df[~df["Title"].astype(str).str.strip().str.lower().str.startswith("job opportunity")]

# Show latest 3 entries
latest_news = df.head(3)

html = ""
for _, row in latest_news.iterrows():
    day = row['Date'].day
    month_year = row['Date'].strftime('%b. %Y')
    html += f"""
    <div class='news-item'>
      <p class='news-title'>{row['Title']}</p>
      <p>{row['Description']}</p>
      <p class='news-date'>{day} {month_year}</p>
    </div>
    """
display(HTML(html))
```
:::
